description:
cmd/6l, cmd/8l: fix chaining bug in jump rewrite

The code was inconsistent about when it used
brchain(x) and when it used x directly, with the result
that you could end up emitting code for brchain(x) but
leave the jump pointing at an unemitted x.

messages.text:
Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=16868c16ece8 ***

cmd/6l, cmd/8l: fix chaining bug in jump rewrite

The code was inconsistent about when it used
brchain(x) and when it used x directly, with the result
that you could end up emitting code for brchain(x) but
leave the jump pointing at an unemitted x.

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6250077

subject: code review 6250077: cmd/6l, cmd/8l: fix chaining bug in jump rewrite
